title: Champion Mastery - Not displaying correctly
body:
Hello everyone,

There is a bug with Champion Mastery displaying at the end of game. Your Mastery points are still being awarded and we are working to resolve the display issue.

I will update with more info when we have it.

-Riot Cochese

replies.body:
Quick update - this fix will require a patch, which we try to avoid where possible. I know that patching is not the best option for us here in Oceania. With that, this issue does not affect all players, and is still functioning behind the scenes. (nobody is losing their progress)

So we are planning to hold on patching this fix out, unless there is another bug that is more critical. I'll keep you all posted once this is resolved.

Thank you,
Riot Cochese
Sorry for the late response here, this was fixed with the patch last week.
I kinda like the circle which spins indefinitely. Glad to know I'm still getting the points for the thing that does stuff.
